website_summaries.verdict: The best 3DS platform for old-school Pokémon adventurers who love everyone’s favorite electric mouse.
pros: An adorable Pikachu-yellow 3DS XL that supports 3D gameplay, online multiplayer, compatibility with original DS games
Amiibo support, and includes parental controls
cons: Does not include a game or AC adapter

customer_reviews.title: From Saudi Arabia, as others have said
customer_reviews.text: It's not the end of the world - US games can still be played on an SA console and you can even do system transfers from NA to SA. But the seller intentionally withheld this information - as others have said there is a sticker on the box obscuring the region. And as others have said, this means that for service it'll have to be shipped to SA. Would've been 5 stars if it had just been advertised as being from the SA, maybe 4 stars if it was from the SA but there was no sticker on the box. But intentionally trying to deceive buyers by placing a sticker on the box is 1 star.
customer_reviews.author: Duncan Boatright

customer_reviews.title: I love this system so much
customer_reviews.text: I love this system so much. I come from a family who appreciates gaming. We're big Nintendo fans and when i saw this pikachu edition I just had to have it. I was also born about 3 years before pokemon was released.
customer_reviews.author: 12-6 Cloud

customer_reviews.title: World's Most Relaxing 3DS
customer_reviews.text: There are no words that can fully express how pleased I am with this 3DS. It works as it should and is GORGEOUS. The milky yellow is beautiful. Just looking at the system makes me happy. The colored buttons contrast the yellow system marvelously, and the Pikachu design on the exterior is perfect. I bought a few cute Pokémon themes in the theme shop (Pikachu Party, Onemuri Pikachu, and Pokémon Radiant Collection) to accent the system soon after transferring my data from my previous system. Needless to say, I'm more than satisfied with the final outcome. TL;DR - The system is gorgeous and is more than worth every penny.
customer_reviews.author: Benjie

customer_reviews.title: Hesitant, yes pleased with outcome
customer_reviews.text: Waited to write the review based off of feedback from other reviews, and i wanted it to be correct. i was nervous but went ahead and still bought it based off of other people commenting on it not working entirely, not wanting to take a charge or charge fully, or because it was not technically a USA version. While, it is not in fact a USA one it still works perfect and can still play US games. i have not noticed any issues with the charging, or anything else. Works as well as i would expect a brand new 3ds would. thanks again
customer_reviews.author: ALEXA

customer_reviews.title: QS serial number
customer_reviews.text: As some other people have stated this is the QS serial model. You’ll have to send it to Singapore for warranty support, but that’s not too big of a deal. You can definitely play NA region games and everything functions the same. These are the non-IPS screens so they don’t looks as good from extreme angles, but they work fine and they’re definitely bright enough. The 3D is really cool and I wish more devices used this technology. Love the pikachu design on the shell. No charging cable so make sure you pick one up, as well
customer_reviews.author: TP

customer_reviews.title: Very cute and works perfectly!
customer_reviews.text: The console came very well packaged and in the original box. Everything worked perfectly and all the parts came as described. The Pikachu design is very cute, and the stylus even looks like Pikachu's ear! Just remember it doesn't come with an AC adapter, which is fine if you have any 3DS charger since they still work. I recommend getting a clear skin to protect the design from scratches, it's really worth protecting!
customer_reviews.author: CTMorseJr

customer_reviews.title: Super cute!
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loooooove this... I’m so happy with it. I’m a little confused why it’s trying to hide it’s from the Middle East....? But I guess.... idk that just seemed weird because they put a blue sticker over the symbol. Anyway whatever it works fine and I love it!!
customer_reviews.author: Sandy Lawson

customer_reviews.title: Received UAE Version
customer_reviews.text: There was both a UAE (APAC) version and North America (NA) version of this console launched, and based on the photo it looks like this should be the NA version (the NA version has no circles on the front of the box, the UAE version has a blue circle with 'UAE' in it on the front of the box). Imagine my surprise when this arrives, and it's a UAE version. Which is fine -- it works with all NA games, and you can use it in the US; but if you ever have any issues, you'll have to ship it to Nintendo of the United Arab Emirates to be fixed. Disappointed and misleading, although the console is great.
customer_reviews.author: A. A. Zaiken

customer_reviews.title: Very much enjoyed!
customer_reviews.text: This was the perfect gift for our 9 year old's birthday. He had an older version but wanted to be able to buy the minecraft for the new 3ds XL, he also loves Pokemon. So we bought the Pikachu design game system for him. He is thrilled and loves it! Great product. Got here fast. It plays all the games we have and he got the minecraft game he wanted. So it's perfect. It's going to be very much enjoyed for a long long time.
customer_reviews.author: Meredith Stone

customer_reviews.title: Great product shipped quick
customer_reviews.text: I broke my DS and needed another one, the seller Half Time sent it fast and I love my new one and although it is from the UAE, it still works with US games and I’m playing all my old games on my new DS now. The charger thing didn’t bother me, as I have 4 chargers, but make sure you get one if you don’t own a charger.
customer_reviews.author: Donnell

customer_reviews.title: Immaculate- So Glad I Snatched This Up!
customer_reviews.text: If you are a collector of consoles, love Nintendo, or just really want this 3DS, get it. It was in pristine condition- from the box (no stickers at all) to the packaging inside, to the device itself. (No UAE issues... nothing) I did pick up a cheap charging cord from my local video gaming store. I knew that it came without it, so I wasn't surprised or disappointed. This Pikachu 3DS was brand new. Plays and lights up beautifully, and I have absolutely no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: CeeCeeR

customer_reviews.title: It’s way to cute!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is yellow with the power of a thunderbolt. It’s cute charm rivals the best 3DS systems. Note that it is a dual tn screen and the chances of getting a 3DS without dual tn are nearly impossible now.
customer_reviews.author: Brandon Ramsey

customer_reviews.title: I love it
customer_reviews.text: I love it. I couldn't pay the price when it very high. So I waited until it went down in price. I have found that if you are thinking of using it on a open NETWORK that you have to agree to the terms for that NETWORK. It will not work. With a private NETWORK you don't have to worry about it. Anyway! The screens are great. I couldn't see that well with the 3d's I have now. I have CP. So it is easier to use for me. I like how the A B Y X buttons have color. The buttons are little bigger than the other 3ds
customer_reviews.author: Mike Waldron

customer_reviews.title: Great addition for an old timer.
customer_reviews.text: Super happy with my purchase of this 3DS. Bought it years after they were popular and wish I would have done it sooner. Works wonderfully in the states and plays our titles fine. I have been playing Pokemon Ultra Moon, Animal Crossing, and Super Mario 3D Land. I never enjoyed Mario games until I played this. My kids both have switches and still want to use the 3DS. Love the Pikachu edition. Super fun great to have on the plane over mobile games as most of the ones I like require paid internet. Wish there were some decent shooters on the 3DS with campaign stories.
customer_reviews.author: DM

customer_reviews.title: NOT US VERSION
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy if you are in the US, it is an UAE version.
customer_reviews.author: Marta

customer_reviews.title: Perfect
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product NEW! It was a Christmas present for my son. This console was everything the description said it would be. As soon as my son opened the package, he was so happy that he cried. It looks just like the description. He was even more excited when he saw it was the XL Edition. He had his favorite Pokemon character and mom was the G.O.A.T (Greatest Of All Time) that day lol.
customer_reviews.author: S. McDuffy

customer_reviews.title: Good System, Wrong Region
customer_reviews.text: The system I got is for the U.A.E., Saudi Arabia, Malaysia, and Singapore region. It can still play US games. I feel like it’s a little shady to not mention that in the product details but to also use the US version box as the picture of the product.
customer_reviews.author: Justin Smith

customer_reviews.title: Really nice pikachi version it’s from another country but everything comes in English as well
customer_reviews.text: Birthday gift for my daughter she absolutely love it exactly like the pictures no difference notice for why it says Arabic version everything still is in English instruction setting everything English with other lenguaje to choose from. Color is a nice yellow not so bright screen colors look nice and works perfectly fine
customer_reviews.author: Laila

customer_reviews.title: It’s a legit 3DS
customer_reviews.text: This product was great. Although i did get the AUS edition... it actually didn’t affect anything. All the games i purchased it first was great. If it’s not in ENG make sure to change the regions to USA. You should automatically make that change once you turn it on and set up the 3Ds as your own. Only one star taken off because of no charging cable, which does say it doesn’t come with it but still. Overall great limited edition product.
customer_reviews.author: Lutges

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade is worth it.
customer_reviews.text: I don't mind the region thing as long as its brand new and I can change the settings. I first got the 3ds back in 2011 when it was brand new so it was long over due to get the "new" version at some point, and the XL screen size definitely does matter and makes a huge difference. Don't need to post pics considering the ones already on here do it justice. It is way nicer in person, smooth, glossy, overall adorable if you're a pokemon fan. Since Nintendo discontinued this version, I think its worth the money.
customer_reviews.author: Bug

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: This item stopped charging after one month. I am waiting for the company to resolve!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good buy. Very pleased.
customer_reviews.text: Very good buy. I was not aware that Nintendo had produced a Pikachu variant for the New 3DS XL until some time after they were introduced. Needless to say by that time it was impossible for me to find one locally. Thanks to Amazon, I was able to acquire one at close to the cost of a regular new 3DS XL. It arrived new in package and functions perfectly. I am very pleased with this purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Brian DuBose

customer_reviews.title: Pokémon Yellow Edition 3DS Review - SATISFIED!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely satisfied seeing as it’s a brand new 3DS. (Pokémon Yellow Edition?!) Note: It does NOT come with a charger, nor the Pokémon Yellow game unfortunately. But still doesn’t change a thing! :-)
customer_reviews.author: MRxJ369

customer_reviews.title: Great game system but came with no charger!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my son for Christmas he loves it but unfortunately it did not come with a charger not sure if this is in the description but just thought I would let it be known... and since I can’t seem to find someone to contact about it I guess I’ll be headed down to the gaming store to buy a new one let’s hope they have one 🤦🏻‍♀️
customer_reviews.author: Brianna brown

customer_reviews.title: US Version !
customer_reviews.text: ive seen reviews of people getting the u.a.e. version, which didnt matter much to me, but luckily i got the US version. thats a huge plus. ive been wanting to upgrade to a New 3ds xl for a long time now and after looking at all the models, i chose the pikachu yellow edition. my first handheld system was a yellow gameboy color that came bundled with the pikachu yellow game, guide book, and link cable. this console was very nostalgic for me.
customer_reviews.author: Travis

customer_reviews.title: A+
customer_reviews.text: I have been enjoying this thing so much that I almost forgot to write a review! Arrived in perfect condition and in a timely manner. Fun to play, connects to the internet so you can download games and such.
customer_reviews.author: Ashley

customer_reviews.title: Buyer Beware, Misrepresented . UAE Version.
customer_reviews.text: While This still works with US games, If you are looking for the US version to add for your collection, or simply because it is pictured on the website, Contact the seller beforehand. My item was fulfilled by amazon but is the UAE/Malaysia version. I will be returning it immediately.
customer_reviews.author: Juan Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Not for use in the US apparently
customer_reviews.text: I received these thinking nothing mattered when using these but apparently they are for use in Malaysia and United Arab Emirates. So unless you’re there, don’t buy this one. If you know someone handy enough with a computer to remove the region lock, that’s great but if you were gonna buy this for you kid, be aware of this fact.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Hart

customer_reviews.title: dose not come with charger
customer_reviews.text: Didn't come with a charger .. was unaware of this
customer_reviews.author: nicole

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: Packaging was great, item was received in new condition, just as promised. Minor scratches with the item but I'm guessing it's just from manufacturer.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Amazing love this 3DS!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is such a great handheld device, love the color and the buttons of this product, the fact that it has the screen and feels of more quality then the 2ds xl, in my opinion this model of the 3ds xl is the best in its class and I will definitely recommend this product to anyone adding a handheld to their gaming collection or for on the go gaming as well!
customer_reviews.author: Kenneth J Danley

customer_reviews.title: 💓CUTE 3DS🌸
customer_reviews.text: OMG I LOVE THIS SUCKER!!! This baby works well and I have had no problem charging it. A charger doesn't come with it so your gonna need to borrow one from your brother like me or buy one😅 Also it didn't come with the Yellow game but Im ok with that.
customer_reviews.author: Esmeralda F.

customer_reviews.title: Everything I have ever ordered
customer_reviews.text: I don't have any complaints about the product I received it works perfectly and my kid loves it... I haven't had any problems wit Amazon but one and they made it right wit me so I will continue to shop through them. It's an amazing place to shop through. You get your orders when they say you are supposed to 99% of the time unless the weather is bad then it might be with in a couple days.
customer_reviews.author: Manda Werner

customer_reviews.title: Exactly what we wanted
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and color. It is exactly what we hoped for. Can’t wait for DD to see it.
customer_reviews.author: ACon08

customer_reviews.title: Bricked
customer_reviews.text: Started telling me every cartridge i inserted was "illegal software" and now it won't read any games whatsoever, as well the circle pad now thinks I'm holding left on it all the time. Couldn't get a repair from nintendo because of the coronavirus and now it's a couple of weeks out of warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Great hand-held console - really cute design!!!
customer_reviews.text: I've owned a number of Pikachu/Pokemon themed Gameboys over the past 15+ years and this one is one of my favorites! Great design and nice size! And hey, for us old timers who like old-school side scrolling play: just turn the 3D off!!!
customer_reviews.author: Carrie A Cruce

customer_reviews.title: Don't use a masterball on a piplup. Just don't.
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful. Screens are super bright, case has a nice feel, and who doesn't love PIKACHU? Loved it so much, bought another one just like it for myself.
customer_reviews.author: Detroit Lori

customer_reviews.title: Fun fun
customer_reviews.text: Grand son loves this DS. Playing it as I am typing. He loves the Pikachu design. Good anytime gift.
customer_reviews.author: Cecilia W

customer_reviews.title: This purchase along with the games was the best one yet
customer_reviews.text: This purchase along with the games was the best one yet.im definitely satisfied with the console and can't stay away. One thing about it is the battery. I've noticed that it dies often and I have to charge it almost every day. I play it twice a day for an hour other than that I'd definitely would buy again
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The box may be opened
customer_reviews.text: It is said to be a new one. However, the box is not sealed and is obviously opened before. The console looks new, but it just looks like you. I will try it for several days and be aware if anything is broken. So I am not care whether a console is new or used. But if I bought a used one by a new one's price. I think its a cheat.
customer_reviews.author: Chang Zhou

customer_reviews.title: It’s absolutely adorable, makes me so happy
customer_reviews.text: American games do work on this. It’s absolutely adorable, makes me so happy, and I love the difference between the XL and the old 3ds. I upgraded and I can not say it was a bad decision. This fits my cutesy needs with the adorable smug pikachu design.
customer_reviews.author: Janey

customer_reviews.title: very cute 3ds
customer_reviews.text: is a gift for granddaughter so havent used yet but is as described and very nice. i know she will love it
customer_reviews.author: dbur

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful System.
customer_reviews.text: It’s everything you expect it to be. Perfect new game system. The only weird thing is that the top screen positions have a lot of play in them. They can move around a fair bit even when in a “slot”. It doesn’t affect anything, just slightly annoying to feel the screen fall and catch itself when you change position while holding it.
customer_reviews.author: Nate

customer_reviews.title: MAKE SURE YOU READ ALL INFO BEFORE PURCHASE
customer_reviews.text: for over 200.00 dollars I expected a charger to be included. luckily my daughter has her old 3ds and that charger works for it and you have to take the whole back plate off to get to the sd card YOU SHOULD PUT THIS KIND OF INFO AT THE TOP NOT 10 PARAGRAPHS DOWN!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the North American system
customer_reviews.text: As others have mentioned, the seller is purposely trying to hide the fact that this is the UAE console, not the North American one. There is a sticker trying to hide the UAE marker on the box as well, despite all the text on the back referring to Saudi Arabia and southeast Asia. Super sketchy and manipulative.
customer_reviews.author: Edmund H.

customer_reviews.title: Must buy if you never had a 3ds before!
customer_reviews.text: Very glad i bought it. I take it everywhere i go. The games are fun to play and I like the style of the system. They games don't take much memory. You can download them and not have to worry about losing the game cards. Amazing product!
customer_reviews.author: Emanuel Gutierrez

customer_reviews.title: Buy it
customer_reviews.text: If you carry this around you will get a girlfriend. Also, I absolutely love my ds. I honestly just think it’s cute. But also it’s just a good system.

customer_reviews.title: Everything as described
customer_reviews.text: New 3ds xl came perfectly. Everything was as described thank you

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: I actually love it so much!!! Now I’m not worried about this because I think it will problem with something but it’s so prefect!! Everything is so good!

customer_reviews.title: No charger included for your $213.
customer_reviews.text: I can’t believe that this child’s gaming system does not come with a charger. Pretty sad especially for the cost.

customer_reviews.title: Never arrived
customer_reviews.text: Never arrived, I recieved an cell phone case. So, never mind.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic Nintendo product
customer_reviews.text: Recieved as a gift for Christmas, and I absolutely love it! I'm so happy to be able to play pokemon and download games again. Hubby was a little upset, was under the assumption Pokemon Yellow comes already preinstalled, we had to pay 10 bucks for it so I cant complain.
customer_reviews.author: Kaitlynn Cranford

customer_reviews.title: I love it!!
customer_reviews.text: Shipped fast. Nothing really to complain about. Box was in perfect condition. Everything works perfectly. I am in love with this thing.

customer_reviews.title: Perfect item
customer_reviews.text: My son was so happy with this. Just an FYI, there is no charger included. But, we still had one from his old one.

customer_reviews.title: Mellow Yellow!
customer_reviews.text: What Granddaughter wouldn’t like Pikachu for her birthday! She loves it!l

customer_reviews.title: So cute!
customer_reviews.text: The photos make no justice to the produtc. It's so beautiful and it feels great in the hands. I think my daughter will enjoy her Christmas gift very much.

customer_reviews.title: I Choose You!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for our Mom for Mother's Day, loved it so much that I went ahead and bought one for myself. It's absolutely adorable and I love that they updated the 3D feature on it. If you're a fan of Pikachu, this is a must have!

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: What's not to love about this 3DS XL, it has Pikachu on it and it's Yellow!

customer_reviews.title: Perfect gift for kids teens 4yrs and up
customer_reviews.text: It was a gift for my little sister she loved it

customer_reviews.title: Great fun game system
customer_reviews.text: Really enjoying playing this system and all of the many options for games, including downloadable content. My only issue was that it didn't come with a power adapter. So there was no way to turn it on until I bought a separate piece.

customer_reviews.text: Exactly as described. I love the colors. Downside no charger like all the other new 3ds.

customer_reviews.title: Cheerful colors
customer_reviews.text: I'm loving this 3DS! The sketch of Pikachu on the front combined with the cute colors make me happy! I received the Singapore version but it plays the same games as the US 3DS version, so don't let that deter you. I suggest get a nice clear case or pouch to keep it from getting scratched.

customer_reviews.title: I love this on it works really well
customer_reviews.text: I got this or my nephew his old one broke. I love this on it works really well .It plays all his old games and has worked without any problems. They seem to have fixed all the problems with the old one . He absolutely loves it.

customer_reviews.title: I love the design!
customer_reviews.text: Just like the rest of them say, there’s no charger cable. But it’s great otherwise!

customer_reviews.title: It’s happened many times since I’ve had it and I’m a bit disappointed. It’s the only complaint I have
customer_reviews.text: If I accidentally press on the top screen, as in just touch it with very light pressure, the entire system shuts off. It’s happened many times since I’ve had it and I’m a bit disappointed. It’s the only complaint I have, otherwise it’s a great console.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product, its fast and easy to use
customer_reviews.text: Great Product, its fast and easy to use. I love the games for the system as well. The 3D effect is amazing.

customer_reviews.title: false advertising
customer_reviews.text: the 3d slider is busted, and that wasnt mentioned at all in the description of the product. this means i cant even get through the startup screen because it forces you to use the 3d function. This makes the 3ds unusable. it sucks bc it seems like it would work great.
customer_reviews.author: Hannah Vera

customer_reviews.title: Best DS and Seller!!
customer_reviews.text: The seller was absolutely quick and awesome at replacing my first purchase when it was defective, so now I’m LOVING my new Pikachu DS!! It’s super light even though it’s an XL and great to play on. Best sellers ever!!

customer_reviews.title: Item had damage
customer_reviews.text: Item arrived quick and works well, but it arrived with a large scratch on the game screen. For the price I paid, this item that was supposed to be new, should have arrived in perfect shape.

customer_reviews.title: Buy it, you won't be disappointed!

customer_reviews.text: Sean was super nice. It was my fault to assume this product comes with charger (which is not) and I was a bit angry and talk to seller, Sean explained to me nicely and solved problem in second. After I search about this issue, it's actually Nintendo sell charger separately.

customer_reviews.title: Love it! <3

customer_reviews.title: Console looks great but the box really takes the cake here
customer_reviews.text: Boy was I pumped to see this thing shipped with 11.2.0 firmware. Fully exploitable to my own custom firmware. I was fully expecting to have to do a motherboard swap. Console looks great but the box really takes the cake here. It is absolutely adorable with pikachu on every flap. Every book and cranny has a different pose. The boxnitself deserves a sixth star! I do hope Nintendo keeps supporting this console with the switch having launched. It quickly became my favorite handheld after the game of advance.

customer_reviews.title: otherwise is pretty much just the same old 3ds

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: this new 3ds looks awesome and for any pokemon fan this is a must cop !

customer_reviews.text: Its a NEW Nintendo 3DS, with Pikachu, what's not to like?

customer_reviews.text: Great product! Just like any other New 3DS XL but with Pikachu glossy cover

customer_reviews.text: Came in secure packaging. Works and looks great. Item exactly as described. 10/10

customer_reviews.title: Got the U.A.E Version.
customer_reviews.text: This looks really good to me. The only thing i need to notice is that you'll most likely get a UAE version of this system. Not a problem for me, but if you actually cares, then you might want to find another shop.
customer_reviews.author: Gao Hongquan

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful
customer_reviews.text: 1: It's a New 3DS XL 2: It's Pikachu 3: It's a fresh, beautiful design to look at every time the device is pulled out.
customer_reviews.author: Bryce Allen-Starr Van Riper

customer_reviews.title: Pickachu 3ds System
customer_reviews.text: It's just like any other N******* 3ds. But this one is yellow with colorful action buttons and a pikachu silhouette on outside case.
customer_reviews.author: OpalYak57

customer_reviews.title: Absolutely worth it
customer_reviews.text: Was supposed to come sometime from Friday to Wednesday. Got it on Friday. This 3ds looks amazing with the nice yellow and the Pikachu on it. It also has an ips screen which is really nice.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan

customer_reviews.title: Great!!
customer_reviews.text: Have it as Christmas gift. Very nice game console. I enjoy it with my new and old games...
customer_reviews.author: Yuki

customer_reviews.title: Works great, looks great; a fine purchase
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my brother for Christmas and so far it seems to be serving him well. He likes the design and enjoys the CFW I've installed for him.
customer_reviews.author: Tyler Herrera

customer_reviews.title: No charger
customer_reviews.text: I like it but i did not receive a charger
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Makes children happy!
customer_reviews.text: My 8-year-old LOVES this. If you like Nintendo, this is great.
customer_reviews.author: Anne Blackhawk

customer_reviews.title: Fun for the money!
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old is so happy with this product! It's a fun spin on a great item.
customer_reviews.author: Anna Hill-Edwards

customer_reviews.title: It’s exactly like the picture.
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and it arrived the day after I ordered it.
customer_reviews.author: Lisa & Razie

customer_reviews.title: No charger, get a larger micro SD card than one included
customer_reviews.text: Came like stated, not worried about it originally being sold to a different country since it can still play games for the US region. Great buy! No problems yet.
customer_reviews.author: Anne A

customer_reviews.title: Perfect!
customer_reviews.text: It’s perfect and absolutely everything I expected. I’ve been playing on a 2Ds for the last year and I’m in love with it but it’s hard to put my new 3DS down to play with it. A charging cord doesn’t come with it as expected with the new 3DSxls but apart from that, I haven’t been able to find anything wrong with it at all... and the Pikachu print on the front is absolutely adorable.
customer_reviews.author: shasta monigold

customer_reviews.title: Collector's edition 3DS XL
customer_reviews.text: Amazing finishing for such a collector's edition console. Didn't notice it didn't come with a charger but that's completely on me.
customer_reviews.author: AlAwadhiation

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great detail love playing with it perfect for the Pokémon fans.
customer_reviews.author: Freshninja

customer_reviews.title: Good purchase
customer_reviews.text: My son loved it. It arrived well packed and new and everything was perfect
customer_reviews.author: Maryam Hussain

customer_reviews.title: Super cute, does exactly what it should
customer_reviews.text: Haven't had any slow downs, is super cute, love it to death and take it around everywhere even after getting a switch.
customer_reviews.author: Jon Nickoloff

customer_reviews.title: Good Purchase
customer_reviews.text: Great idea to get out of the doghouse. The artwork is really cool.
customer_reviews.author: Chad L.

product_meta.title: Nintendo New 3DS XL - Pikachu Yellow Edition [Discontinued]
product_meta.description: THE NEXT DIMENSION IN ENTERTAINMENT - This colorful yellow system sports a charming drawing of popular Pokemon Pikachu on the cover. The New Nintendo 3DS XL system combines next-generation portable gaming with super-stable 3D technology and added control features. Take 3D photos, connect with friends, and enhance your gaming experiences with added amiibo support. The New Nintendo 3DS XL system plays all Nintendo DS games. Nintendo DS games will not appear in 3D. AC Adapter sold separately. New Nintendo 3DS XL uses the same AC adapter as Nintendo DSi, Nintendo 3DS and 2DS. 3D Mode recommended for Ages 7+
feature_bullets: This colorful yellow system sports a charming drawing of popular Pokemon Pikachu on the cover.
The New Nintendo 3DS XL system plays all Nintendo DS games. Nintendo DS games will not appear in 3D.
AC Adapter sold separately. New Nintendo 3DS XL uses the same AC adapter as Nintendo DSi, Nintendo 3DS and 2DS.
